# cdproj

`cdproj` is a really simple project location rememberer.

## Installation

simply install via pip:

    pip install cdproj

## Usage

To `cd` to a project, simply type in your favorite shell:

    cdproj project_name

To register a new project:

    cdproj add project_name

To remove a project:

    cdproj rm project_name

To list projects:

    cdproj ls

That's all.
